description: Returns the extended properties of a product.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

registration_name.description: Name of the Azure Stack registration.

productkind.description: Specifies the kind of the product (virtualMachine or virtualMachineExtension).

properties.description: Specifies additional properties describing the product.

gallerypackageblobsasuri.description: The URI to the .azpkg file that provides information required for showing product in the gallery.
